::KitKat::

She turned her head around to see what the noise was behind her.  She 
saw the Lavacons firing on HellBeast and his crew.  At first she 
wanted to tell them to stop what they were doing, but then, she 
thought better of it and let them have thier fun. She kept walking to 
the base.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dark Lavacons::
> 
>           The Dark Lavacons watched all that was going on with 
these preds and their enemies.  They felt an instant urge to fire 
when some other bots approached Starscream.  
Funny............Starscream was somewhat of a friend........Naaa.  
This wasn't the way of the Dark Lavacons.  Astral flew up in the air, 
pulled out his dark flame missile launcher and fired a few blasts at 
Hell Beast and Waspinator(and anyother preds on their side).
> 
>         Fenox started firing his dark flamethrowers at Waspinator 
and Hell Beast, laughing madly.
> 
>         Starlight fired a direct shot from her dark flame crossbow 
at the back of Waspinator's head.
> 
>          Griplash grabbed his dark lavablade, jumped up into the 
air, and came slashing it down at Hell Beast's shoulder.
> 
>          Recklessa watched for a moment and laughed, as she started 
spraying shots from her darkflame gatling gun at Hell Beast and the 
other intruders.
